LanguageData.Axi_P_M17_21CA.label: SIG Sauer M17
LanguageData.Axi_P_M17_21CA.description: Fielded by the Amurcan armed forces as their standard-issue sidearm, the M17 is more-or-less a bog standard striker-fired 9mm pistol. While it may have faced difficulties during development and the early stages of development, the M17 has proven to be a dependable sidearm, seeing usage by everyone from pilots to infantrymen to the soldiers of the prestigious Old Guard.
